tweet: Glad to be on Twitter! We are a family friendly B&B in North-Central AZ. Best place for an AZ family holiday year round!
Put up the Christmas tree with our 2 year old daughter, it was AWESOME! Also put and powered up 10 000 minilights. The B&B looks great!
We still have rooms available in December, we are offering 50% discount on all rooms until January 1st. http://www.desertrosebandb.com
Any of the fans coming for the Fiesta Bowl should stop in Sedona for a few days of R&R. The weather is great for hiking! http://bit.ly/NZaaG
